overview: Trying desperately to forget his roots, Henry is drawn back into the fray with his father when finances get the better of him.  Returning with him to sell the family farm, his fiance soon discovers disturbing secrets about his past.  A childhood sweetheart, a subborn father thick with Swiss traditions, and a desperate lawyer whoâ€™ll do anything for money force Henry to decide between protecting his father or turning his back on him.
tagline: To confront his past, he must risk everything...
title: Neutral Territory
